content: Monitor CI status every 3 minutes for failures
Fix CI Django test failures - JWT environment setup issues
Fix Test and Lint workflow JWT configuration
Fix frontend build TypeScript error in weather API
Fix both CI workflow failures - Docker build timeouts and E2E service startup
Remove all legacy djangoToken references causing TypeScript errors
Successfully achieved first passing CI run!
Achieved consistent CI success - Two Test and Lint workflows passing!
Fix E2E test authentication by adding JWT configuration to docker-compose.e2e.yaml
Fix test user authentication command using wrong field (email vs username)
MAJOR SUCCESS: Test and Lint workflow now consistently passing with Django tests fixed!
Fix E2E authentication issue - login API was using email instead of username for authenticate()
Fix local Docker environment JWT configuration for testing
Add cache-busting to force Docker image rebuilds in CI
Test new CI run with cache-busting to verify E2E authentication fixes work
Next PR: Create user-facing authentication guides for JWT migration changes
